name: Pack-Man (DonPasquale)
description:
Hi everyone!

This is my submission for the 'Lebanon Quarantine Jam'. The theme was 'Pack'.

In this game you are Agent Pack-Man, a secret agent who delivers 'packages' for the government. Since the theme is mostly covered by the narratives and only to a small part by the gameplay, I hope that the theme is not interpreted too vaguely.

Anyway, I am quite satisfied with the end product.
Have fun playing!
